title: PUBLISHERS WEEKLY Bestsellers
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION PUBLISHERS WEEKLY Bestsellers 
Copyright 5/8/2015 Publishers Weekly. Week ending 10/11/2015, powered by Nielsen Bookscan 5/8/2015 The Nielsen Company. 
HARDCOVER FICTION 
1. "The Survivor" by Flynn/Mills (Atria/Bestler) 
2. "A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms" by George R.R. Martin (Bantam) 
3. "The Murder House" by James Patterson and David Ellis (Little, Brown) 
4. "The Girl in the Spider's Web" by David Lagercrantz (Knopf) 
5. "Come Rain or Come Shine" by Jan Karon (G.P. Putnam's Sons) 
6. "Dashing Through the Snow" by Debbie Macomber (Ballantine) 
7. "Go Set a Watchman" by Harper Lee (Harper) 
8. "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins (Riverhead) 
9. "Make Me" by Lee Child (Delacorte Press) 
10. "Shadows of Self" by Brandon Sanderson (Tor) 
11. "After You" by Jojo Moyes (Pamela Dorman Books) 
12. "Saturn Run" by Sanford/Ctein (Putnam) 
13. "The Secret Chord" by Geraldine Brooks (Viking) 
14. "Pretty Girls" by Karin Slaughter (William Morrow) 
15. "The Cinder Spires: The Aeronaut's Windlass" by Jim Butcher (Roc) 
HARDCOVER NONFICTION

2. "A More Perfect Union" by Ben Carson (Penguin/Sentinel)

6. "M Train" by Patti Smith (Knopf) 
7. "A Common Struggle" by Kennedy/Fried (Penguin/Blue Rider)

9. "Why Not Me?" by Mindy Kaling (Crown Archetype) 
10. "Big Magic" by Elizabeth Gilbert (Riverhead) 
11. "Primed to Perform" by Doshi/McGregor (Harper Business) 
12. "Rising Strong" by Brene Brown (Spiegel & Grau) 
13. "The Courage to Act" by Ben S. Bernanke (Norton) 
14. "The 20/20 Diet" by Phil McGraw (Bird Street Books) 
15. "Rosemary" by Kate Clifford Larson (HMH)

2. "Willow Brook Road" by Sherryl Woods (Harlequin, MIRA) 
3. "Deadline" by John Sanford (Berkley)

7. "Hope to Die" by James Patterson (Hachette/Vision)

10. "The Hidden" by Heather Graham (Harlequin, MIRA) 
11. "Long, Tall Christmas" by Janet Dailey (Kensington/Zebra) 
12. "Down the Rabbit Hole" by J.D. Robb, Mary Blaney, Elaine Fox, Mary Kay McComas and R.C. Ryan (Jove) 
13. "Smoke Jensen, the Beginning" by William W. Johnstone (Pinnacle) 
14. "The Escape" by David Baldacci (Hachette/Vision) 
15. "About a Vampire" by Lynsay Sands (Avon) 
TRADE PAPERBACKS
